metadata.section_title: Seasonal agricultural workers

chunks.text: ### Seasonal agricultural workers
chunks.summary: This provision applies to seasonal agricultural workers seeking employment in the UK. It requires workers to meet specific eligibility criteria, including fulfilling health and character standards, with exceptions only under defined conditions. Employers must also adhere to licensing and reporting obligations.
